contents.text: Thank you for calling Xoriant in South Bay, the leading product engineering and technology services recruitment partner.
If you are a software engineer looking for your next opportunity, press 1.
To speak directly with a recruiter about open positions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our recruitment specialists.

navigationGoals: Chat with a recruiter about current engineering openings
Speak with a recruiter about software engineering positions that value my veteran experience.
I want to connect with a recruiter to discuss current software engineer vacancies.
Please connect me to a recruiter so I can learn about available software engineer positions.
I would like to connect with a recruiter to discuss available software engineering positions.

contents.text: To submit your resume for future product engineering roles, press 2.
Please hold while we prepare to receive your resume.

navigationGoals: Send my resume for future engineering opportunities
Submit my resume for future product engineering roles at Xoriant.
I want to submit my resume into your product engineering talent pipeline.
I would like help submitting my resume for future product engineering roles.
I want to submit my résumé for consideration in upcoming product engineering roles.

contents.text: If you represent a company seeking top technology talent, press 2.
To discuss enterprise software staffing solutions, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you with our enterprise staffing team.

navigationGoals: Explore enterprise software staffing services for my firm
Discuss enterprise software staffing solutions for my veteran-owned business.
I want to consult on enterprise-scale software staffing and resource augmentation.
I need to speak with your enterprise staffing team about hiring software talent for my company.
I’d like to speak with someone about enterprise software staffing solutions for my organization.

contents.text: To learn about talent acquisition for high-growth startups, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our startup recruitment specialists.

navigationGoals: Find out about talent acquisition programs for high-growth startups
Learn about talent acquisition services for my high-growth startup.
I want to learn about your startup-focused talent acquisition frameworks.
Please transfer me to someone who can explain recruiting solutions for my startup.
I’m interested in learning about talent acquisition services tailored for a high-growth startup.
